mapper.sql: APP_ID, APP_VERSION, APP_TYPE, APP_PATH, APP_UPDATE_LOG, APP_SIZE, APP_MD5, APP_CONSTRAINT, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG

where del = 0 and APP_ID = #{appId} and APP_VERSION = #{appVersion} and APP_TYPE = #{appType} and APP_PATH = #{appPath} and APP_UPDATE_LOG = #{appUpdateLog} and APP_SIZE = #{appSize} and APP_MD5 = #{appMd5} and APP_CONSTRAINT = #{appConstraint} and CREATOR = #{creator} and CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and CORP_ID = #{corpId} and FLAG = #{flag}
mapper.insert: insert into bd_app_version (APP_VERSION, APP_TYPE, APP_PATH, APP_UPDATE_LOG, APP_SIZE, APP_MD5, APP_CONSTRAINT, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG) values (#{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appUpdateLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appConstraint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into bd_app_version APP_VERSION, APP_TYPE, APP_PATH, APP_UPDATE_LOG, APP_SIZE, APP_MD5, APP_CONSTRAINT, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG, #{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appUpdateLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appConstraint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update bd_app_version APP_VERSION = #{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_TYPE = #{appType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, APP_PATH = #{appPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_UPDATE_LOG = #{appUpdateLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_SIZE = #{appSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, APP_MD5 = #{appMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_CONSTRAINT = #{appConstraint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bd_app_version set APP_VERSION = #{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_TYPE = #{appType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, APP_PATH = #{appPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_UPDATE_LOG = #{appUpdateLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_SIZE = #{appSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, APP_MD5 = #{appMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_CONSTRAINT = #{appConstraint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from bd_app_version where APP_TYPE = #{appType} and FLAG = 0 and DEL = 0 order by CREATE_DATE desc limit 1
